title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Bring the excitement of STEM learning into your home with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit! This award-winning kit is perfect for young minds aged 8 and up, offering 25 guided experiments that explore the fascinating world of motors and generators.

The 48-page color student guide will help kids in grades 3-6 navigate the experiments with ease. With features like an electric motor made of transparent plastic, battery-powered motor operation, and the ability to transform into a hand-crank electric generator, this kit is as educational as it is fun.

Discover the wonders of magnetic fields and electric current through hands-on learning. The kit includes everything you need to dive into the world of electricity and motion. Don't miss out on this opportunity to play and learn with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit - a true gem in electronic learning!

Unlock the wonders of STEM education with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit! This award-winning kit is perfect for children aged 8 and up, offering 25 guided experiments that bring science to life. With a 48-page color student guide, kids can delve into the world of electric motors, generators, magnetic fields, and more. 

This kit is designed for grades 3-6 and has received the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award. With components made of transparent plastic and the ability to switch between battery-powered motor and hand-crank electric generator configurations, this kit offers hands-on learning like never before. 

Explore the fascinating world of energy conversion, build simple circuits, and experiment with magnets to truly understand the principles of motion and electricity. With dimensions of 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, this kit is the perfect educational tool for curious minds. Don't miss out on this opportunity to play, learn, and discover with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit!
